A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nothing will ever surpass episodes 4-6\, but to be honest\, this is the best star wars movie out of 1\, 2\, 3\, And 7. Episode 8 does a great job at bringing back what made star wars unique. Its ability to use several different side stories and in the end combine them all into one epic ending\, but\, not really the ending(;. I really liked it\, the characters did well\, and the ending was great\, and even though it wasnt what I expected\, when has star wars ever met our expectations? Right\, it exceeds them\, and so did this one. It definitely helps to get episode 7 out of my mind.
